title: 134. Government Employees Gone Wild
description: The Encyclopedia of Ethical Failures catalogs the fiscal, sexual, and mental lapses of federal workers -- all with an eye toward preventing the next big mistake.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
